select
from health_coins_log where user_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY createtime desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from health_coins_log 1=1

AND user_phone like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{phone}),'%')

select
from health_coins_log where user_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
